flavorText:
"Faith can quicken the stones themselves with life."
—Writings of Mikaeus

foreignData.flavorText: „Glaube kann selbst die Steine mit Leben erfüllen."—Schriften des Mikaeus
foreignData.name: Grab des Engels
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, kannst du das Grab des Engels bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 3/3 weißen Engel-Artefaktkreatur mit Flugfähigkeit werden lassen.

foreignData.flavorText: "La fe puede conferir vida a las propias piedras".—Escrituras de Mikaeus
foreignData.name: Tumba del ángel
foreignData.text: Siempre que una criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, puedes hacer que la Tumba del ángel se convierta en una criatura artefacto Ángel blanca 3/3 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: « La foi peut donner vie aux pierres elles-mêmes. »—Écrits de Mikaeus
foreignData.name: Tombe de l'ange
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'une créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, vous pouvez faire que la Tombe de l'ange devienne une créature-artefact 3/3 blanche Ange avec le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: "La fede può infondere vita persino nelle pietre."—Scritti di Mikaeus
foreignData.name: Sepolcro dell'Angelo
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta una creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, puoi far diventare il Sepolcro dell'Angelo una creatura artefatto Angelo 3/3 bianca con volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 「信仰は石にさえ命の息吹を与える。」――ミケウスのメモ
foreignData.name: 天使の墳墓
foreignData.text: クリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、あなたは「ターン終了時まで、天使の墳墓は飛行を持つ白の３/３の天使・アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。」を選んでもよい。

foreignData.name: 천사의 무덤
foreignData.text: 생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 당신은 턴종료까지 천사의 무덤을 비행을 가진 3/3 백색 천사 마법물체 생물이 되도록 할 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: "A fé pode dar vida até mesmo às pedras."— Escritos de Mikaeus
foreignData.name: Tumba de Anjo
foreignData.text: Toda vez que uma criatura entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, você pode fazer com que Tumba de Anjo se torne uma criatura artefato branca 3/3 do tipo Anjo com voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: «Вера может оживить даже камни».— Из записей Микеаса
foreignData.name: Гробница Ангела
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, вы можете заставить Гробницу Ангела стать артефактом существом 3/3 белый Ангел с Полетом до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 「信念能替顽石激发生命。」～米凯耶的著作
foreignData.name: 天使之墓
foreignData.text: 每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你可以令天使之墓成为3/3白色，具飞行异能的天使神器生物直到回合结束。

foreignData.flavorText: 「信念能替頑石激發生命。」～米凱耶的著作
foreignData.name: 天使之墓
foreignData.text: 每當一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，你可以令天使之墓成為3/3白色，具飛行異能的天使神器生物直到回合結束。

name: Angel's Tomb
originalText: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: If Angel’s Tomb is already a creature when a creature enters the battlefield under your control, its ability will override any effects that set its base power and toughness to specific values, but other changes to its power and toughness (such as the one created by Titanic Growth) will still apply.

Effects setting Angel’s Tomb’s base power and toughness to specific values that begin to apply after Angel’s Tomb has become a creature will override the effect of Angel’s Tomb. For example, if an effect causes a 3/3 Angel’s Tomb to become 0/1, it will remain 0/1 until another effect (such as triggering the ability of Angel’s Tomb a second time or targeting it with Titanic Growth) causes those values to change.

text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
